intro.narration: In the heart of a sterile CIA safe house, you're tasked with extracting the truth from a burned asset. The air is cold and dry, the lighting fluorescent and humming. A one-way mirror separates you from your subject, who watches you with calculated composure.

nodes.narration: You're thrown into the interrogation room without preparation; the subject is already seated. The HVAC drone echoes in the background, a constant reminder of the ticking clock.

choices.text: Promise fairness and safety, empathizing with their situation.
Present evidence and tighten the time squeeze, pushing for a quick confession.
Offer a small, believable lie to bait a correction.

nodes.narration: The subject counters with a partial story, leaving holes in their narrative.

choices.text: Quietly surface a contradiction and wait for the subject to grow anxious.
Offer protection for a name, potentially forming an alliance.
Bluff about surveillance footage, testing the subject's reaction.

nodes.narration: With the subject growing increasingly defensive, you must choose your next move carefully.

choices.text: Bring in a ‘good cop’ ally to reframe the situation.
Push too hard, potentially losing access to the subject.
Allow the subject to flip the frame, accusing you; you must concede or counter.
Use precision to extract a verifiable detail from the subject.

endings.title: Cold Confession
endings.summary: The subject yields a verifiable detail that unlocks the next lead.
endings.narration: Cold Confession (success). The scene resolves with consequences that set the next moves.

endings.title: Fragile Alliance
endings.summary: The subject agrees to help but sets conditions that may backfire.
endings.narration: Fragile Alliance (mixed). The scene resolves with consequences that set the next moves.

endings.title: Ice-Out
endings.summary: Access lost; you’ll need an external angle to proceed.
endings.narration: Ice-Out (failure). The scene resolves with consequences that set the next moves.

endings.title: Public Reversal
endings.summary: The subject reframes you as the aggressor; your credibility becomes a new resource to manage.
endings.narration: Public Reversal (twist). The scene resolves with consequences that set the next moves.
